message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. I propose a price of $14000 for the product.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the effort you've put into finding a mutually beneficial solution. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $12500 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a proposal that might work for both of us. I am willing to consider $13000 for the product. This is my best offer for this round.
Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a price of $12800 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After reviewing our conversation, I believe we can reach a fair compromise. My final offer for the product is $13500. I hope this meets your expectations.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've reviewed my budget again, and I would like to propose a price of $13200 for the product.
Considering our previous discussions, I am willing to offer the product at $13800. I believe this is a fair price that respects both our interests.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. After further review, I would like to propose a price of $13500 for the product.

I appreciate your continued interest, Bob. In light of our ongoing negotiations, I am willing to offer the product at $14000. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while remaining within your budget constraints.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts in trying to meet my budget. I would like to propose a final price of $13700 for the product.
